T11jithetuu:11: vipakṣe ca asattvameva niścitamiti tṛtīyaṃ rūpam //
T11jithetuu:12: 4. tatra pakṣaḥ prasiddho dharmī prasiddhaviśeṣaṇena viśiṣṭaḥ svayaṃ sādhayitumiṣṭaḥ pratyakṣādyaviruddhaḥ /
T11jithetuu:13: yathā dharmī śabdo 'nitya iti viśeṣaṇena viśiṣṭaḥ sādhyaḥ /
T11jithetuu:38: 12. yathā dhūmādirdharmī buddhimaddhetūtpannaḥ sādhya iti pratyakṣaviruddhaḥ pakṣābhāsaḥ /
T11jithetuu:41: vedavacanaṃ dharmyapauruṣeyamiti sādhye śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyaka iti pauruṣeyatvasya siddheḥ //
T11jithetuu:53: sāṃkhyasya bauddhaṃ pratyātmā cetana iti sādhyam //
T11jithetuu:55: vaiśeṣikasya bauddhaṃ prati samavāyikāraṇamātmeti kāyaḥ sthirasvabhāva iti vā //
T11jithetuu:58: yo heturivābhāsate na tu hetutvena sidhyati //
T11jithetuu:62: 24. pakṣe sapakṣe cāsan vipakṣe ca san yaḥ sa viruddha iti hetvābhāsaḥ sādhyaviparītasiddheḥ //
T11jithetuu:63: 25. sapakṣavipakṣayorubhayorbhāve 'bhāve vā saṃśaye vāsiddhapratibandho yo hetuḥ so 'naikāntiko hetvābhāsaḥ /
T11jithetuu:67: 27. cetanastaruriti sādhye sarvatvagapaharaṇe maraṇāditi hetuḥ prativādinaṃ bauddhaṃ pratyasiddha iti prativādyasiddhaścittādinirodhasya bauddhasyeṣṭatvāt
T11jithetuu:68: 28. acetanāḥ sukhādaya iti sādhye utpattimattvāditi hetuḥ sāṃkhyasya svayaṃ vādino 'siddha iti vādyasiddhaḥ //
T11jithetuu:69: 29. vaiśeṣikeṇa prativādinaṃ bauddhaṃ prati pṛthivyādirdharmī kārya iti sādhya ekaikakṣaṇavadanyānyotpādāditi vādinaḥ svayamasiddhaḥ /
T11jithetuu:72: cetanāstaravaḥ svāpāditi hetuścandane vādinaḥ svayaṃ pakṣaikadeśe 'siddhaḥ /
T11jithetuu:73: na hi sarve vṛkṣā rātrau patrasaṃkocabhājaḥ //
T11jithetuu:74: 31. evameva kṣityādirgharmī buddhimajjāta iti sādhye kāryamiti heturbauddhaṃ pratyasiddhaḥ pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ kāryakāraṇasambandhasiddhasvarūpeṇa kṣityādīnāṃ siddheḥ /
T11jithetuu:77: yadīha dhūmaḥ syādatra vahniḥ syāditi sādhye hetvaniścayāt //
T11jithetuu:79: eṣvanekeṣu nikuñjeṣu kasmiṃścin nikuñje mayūra iti sādhye kekāyitāditi heturiti //
T11jithetuu:84: 37. yathā śabdasya nityatvādike dharme sādhye prameyatvāditi hetuḥ sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ sarvatra varttamānaḥ sādhāraṇo 'naikāntika iti //
T11jithetuu:85: 38. evaṃ śabdo nitya iti sādhye śrāvaṇatvāditi hetuḥ sapakṣe vipakṣe cāvṛtterasādhāraṇo 'naikāntikaḥ //
T11jithetuu:86: 39. evaṃ śabdasyāprayatnānantarīyakatve sādhye 'nityatvāditi hetuḥ sapakṣaikadeśavṛtti rvipakṣavyāpyanaikāntikaḥ /
T11jithetuu:92: 40. evaṃ śabdasya prayatnānantīyakatve sādhye 'nityatvāditi hetu rghaṭādau sarvatra vidyate /
T11jithetuu:97: dharmī śabdo nitya iti sādhye 'mūrttatvāditi hetuḥ /
T11jithetuu:99: tatra sapakṣaikadeśa ākāśe 'mūrttatvaṃ vidyate na paramāṇau paramāṇūnāṃ mūrttatvāt /
T11jithetuu:103: kapilādi rdharmyasarvajña iti sādhye vaktṛtvāditi hetū rathyāpuruṣādau sapakṣe vidyate vipakṣe sarvajñe saṃdigdhaḥ /
T11jithetuu:106: ṛṣabhavardhamānādi rdharmī sarvajña iti sādhye kevalaśāstrakarttṛtvāditi hetuḥ sapakṣe sarvajñe saṃdigdhaḥ /
T11jithetuu:111: jīvaccharīrasambandhī prāṇādiḥ sātmake nirātmake vā varttamāno vyāvṛtto vetyaniścayaḥ //
T11jithetuu:115: dṛṣṭāntābhāvādanvayasyāniścayo vyatirekasya ca niścaya ityayaṃ saṃdigdho hetuḥ //
T11jithetuu:118: 49. yathā dharmī śabdo nitya iti sādhyadharmaḥ /
T11jithetuu:119: kṛtakatvādākāśādivadityayaṃ heturghaṭādau vipakṣa eva vidyate na sapakṣe //
T11jithetuu:120: 50. evaṃ dharmī śabdo nitya iti sādhye prayatnānantarīyakatvāditi hetuḥ sapakṣa ākāśādau nāsti ghaṭādāvekadeśe 'sti vidyudādau nāstīti /
T11jithetuu:123: ete cakṣurādayaḥ parārthā iti sādhyadharmaḥ saṃghātatvāditi hetuḥ śayanāsanādivaditi sapakṣanirdeśaḥ /
T11jithetuu:124: ayaṃ heturyathā cakṣurādeḥ pārārthyaṃ sādhayati tathā saṃhatatvamapi parasya sādhayati /
T11jithetuu:127: dharmyādirbuddhimataḥ kāraṇādutpadyata iti sādhye sāśratvāditi hetuḥ /
T11jithetuu:129: yathānena hetunā buddhimaddhetuto jātatvaṃ sādhyate tathā buddhimatkarttuḥ sāśrayatvamapi sādhyate //
T11jithetuu:131: vaiśeṣikeṇa yogācāraṃ prati dharmyātmā cetanā iti sādhye vijñānādhiṣṭhānāditi hetu ryathācetanamātmānaṃ cetanaṃ sādhayati tathāyaṃ heturanityamapi sādhayati vijñānasyānityatvāt //
T11jithetuu:133: 55. viruddhāvyabhicārī kutrāpi hetudoṣo na bhavatīti tasyodāharaṇopanyāso na yuktaḥ /
T11jithetuu:139: yadupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sadyatra nopalabhyate na tat tatra asti /
T11jithetuu:144: sapakṣādanyo dṛṣṭānto na kaścidastīti sapakṣa evāyaṃ sādharmyeṇa dṛṣṭānto bhavati /
T11jithetuu:155: maraṇadharmā puruṣa iti sādhye rāgādimattvāditi hetū rathyāpuruṣadṛṣṭānte saṃdigdhaḥ /
T11jithetuu:158: dharmī kaścit puruṣaḥ asarvajña iti sādhye rāgādimattvāditi hetuḥ /
T11jithetuu:172: sādhyena sādhanasya vyāptirdarśanīyā sādhanena tu sādhyasya vyāptirdarśitā /
T11jithetuu:178: iha paramāṇurvaidharmyadṛṣṭānta iti sādhanadharmo 'mūrttatvaṃ vyāvṛttaṃ mūrttatvātparamāṇunām /
T11jithetuu:182: iha sādhyadharmo nityatvaṃ vyāvṛttaṃ karmaṇo 'nityatvāt sādhanadharmo na vyāvṛtto 'mūrttatvātkarmaṇaḥ //
T11jithetuu:185: atrākāśādervaidharmyadṛṣṭāntāt sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ ca na vyāvṛttam //
T11jithetuu:192: iha vaidharmyodāharaṇa ukta ṛṣabhavardhamānāderasarvajñatvaṃ vyāvṛttamavyāvṛttaṃ veti saṃdehaḥ //
T11jithetuu:194: iha trayīvidā brāhmaṇena kapilakaṇādādiḥ puruṣo na grāhyavacano rāgādimattvāditi /
T11jithetuu:195: atra vaidharmyodāharaṇamucyate yo grāhyavacano na sa rāgādimān yathā gotamādayaḥ dharmaśāstrāṇāṃ praṇetāra iti /
T11jithetuu:200: yo vītarāgaḥ sa na parigrahāgrahavān yathā ṛṣabhavarddhemānādiriti /
T11jithetuu:201: ṛṣabhādeḥ vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntād vītarāgatvaparigrahāgrahayoḥ sādhyasādhanadharmayorvyatireko 'vyatireko veti saṃdehaḥ /
T11jithetuu:208: yatrāvītarāgatvaṃ nāsti na sa vaktā yathopalakhaṇḍa iti /
T11jithetuu:209: yadyapīdamupalakhaṇḍādvyāvṛttaṃ tathāpi sarvasmādvītarāgādvaktṛtvaṃ na vyāvṛttaṃ sandehāt //
T11jithetuu:214: evaṃ yannityaṃ tatsarvaṃ niyatamakṛtakaṃ dṛśyate yathākāśādiriti vāgvibhāgo vaktrā karttavyaḥ /
T11jithetuu:225: yadā pūrvapakṣavādino 'bhūtaṃ doṣamudbhāvayati tadā sa dūṣaṇābhāso jātiriti /
T11jithetuu:227: yathā pakṣadoṣābhāve pakṣadoṣodbhāvanaṃ hetudoṣābhāve hetudoṣodbhāvanaṃ dṛṣṭāntadoṣābhāve ca dṛṣṭāntadoṣodbhāvanaṃ dūṣaṇābhāsa iti //
T11jithetuu:229: pratijñā hetuḥ udāharaṇam upanayaḥ nigamanaṃ ceti pañcāvayavaṃ sādhanamiti /
T11jithetuu:232: yatkṛtakaṃ sarvaṃ tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā ghaṭādirityudāharaṇam /
T11jithetuu:239: yatkṛtakaṃ sarvaṃ tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā ghaṭādiriti dṛṣṭānte sādhyasādhanayorvyāptipratipādanamanvaya ityucyate //
T11jithetuu:243: pratijñā nigamanaṃ ca sarvathā na vaktavye //
T11jithetuu:245: yathā yatkṛtakaṃ sarvaṃ tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā ghaṭādiḥ śabdo 'pi kṛtaka iti sādharmyaprayogaḥ /
T11jithetuu:248: yannityaṃ tadakṛtakaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathākāśādiḥ śabdastu kṛtaka iti vaidharmyaprayogaḥ //
T11jithetuu:254: atyādayaḥ krāntādyarthe dvitīyayeti samāsenābhidheyaliṅgaḥ pratyakṣaśabdaḥ siddhaḥ /
T11jithetuu:255: pratyakṣo 'vabodhaḥ pratyakṣā buddhiḥ pratyakṣaṃ jñānaṃ ceti yuktaṃ bhavati //
T11jithetuu:256: 91. cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ nāsikā jihvā kāyaśceti pañcendriyāṇi /
T11jithetuu:257: tadāśritasya jñānasya pañca grāhyaviṣayā rūpaṃ śabdo gandho rasaḥ spraṣṭavyañceti pañcaiva prameyāṇi //
T11jithetuu:258: 92. tacca pratyakṣaṃ nāmajātyādikalpanāpoḍhaṃ nirvikalpaṃ vā yadi punarabhrāntaṃ pramāṇamucyate pradarśitārthe 'visaṃvādāt /
T11jithetuu:265: ayaṃ sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti jñānaṃ ca /
T11jithetuu:268: vyāvahārikamindriyajñānaṃ sarvacittacaittānāmātmasaṃvedanaṃ svasaṃvedanaṃ bhūtārthabhāvanāsphuṭaprakarṣaparyantajaṃ yogijñānaṃ ceti //
T11jithetuu:275: 98. tatra svārthaṃ tāvat pakṣadharmagrahaṇāt sādhyasādhanasambandhasmṛteḥ paścāt pratipatturarthasya yathāvadyā pratītistadeva svārthānumānam
T11jithetuu:278: yathā yatna dhūmaḥ tatra agniryathā mahānasādau /
T11jithetuu:280: agnyabhāve dhūmābhāvo yathā sajale deśa iti atra tu dhūmāditi //
T11jithetuu:284: iha punastena vyāpakena rūpeṇa vyāpyo hetuḥ //
T11jithetuu:291: hetuphalasambandhe vyāpyavyāpakasambandhe ca siddhe sādhyasādhanasambandho bhavati nānyathā visaṃvādakatvāt //
T11jithetuu:297: 107. imāni phalāni pakvānyekaśākhāto jātatvādbhuktaphalavadityatra prāyeṇaivaṃ dṛṣṭe 'pi sādhyasādhanayorvisaṃvāda eva //
T11jithetuu:298: 108. yatpārthivaṃ tatsarvaṃ lohalekhyaṃ dṛśyate yathā vṛkṣādaya iti /
T11jithetuu:300: 109. ye prāṇinaste sarve sakandharā yathoṣṭrādaya iti /
T11jithetuu:306: bhāratīyopādhyāyena paṇḍitena kumārakalasena bhāṣāntarakārakeṇa bhikṣuṇā śākyaprabheṇa ca bhoṭabhāṣāyāṃ vipariṇamayya saṃśodhya ca vinyastaḥ
